segments.text: I observe the kitchen quietly from my spot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems content drying her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the overflowing sink makes me worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All that water damaging the cabinets, it's heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's climb looks so risky on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he could tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watching him adds to the tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just kids wanting cookies, but it's unsafe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing in the puddle, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It reminds me of how quickly things can go wrong at home.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunny window contrasts with the indoor trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang seeing potential harm ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hopefully, it all ends without any real hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
